introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text1: Gridix company (hereinafter - "we", "us", "our") takes your privacy protection seriously. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when using our FloorPlan Wizard service.
introduction.text2: By using our service, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.text: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
dataUsage.item3: Processing your requests and support inquiries
dataUsage.item5: Improving service quality and user experience

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing with Third Parties
dataSharing.text: We do not sell, rent or transfer your personal data to third parties, except in the following cases:
dataSharing.item3: When using trusted service providers (hosting, analytics)
dataSharing.item4: In case of legal requirement or court order
dataSharing.item5: To protect our rights and user security

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data:
dataSecurity.item2: Encryption of sensitive data at rest

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.text: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
userRights.accessDesc: obtain information about what data we process
userRights.portabilityDesc: receive data in a structured format
userRights.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us at: inbox@gridix.live

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.text: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve service functionality:
cookies.manage: You can manage cookie settings in your browser.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We store your personal data only for the necessary period:
dataRetention.account: Account data: until account deletion or 3 years of inactivity
dataRetention.projects: Project data: until project deletion by user
dataRetention.support: Support data: up to 3 years after case closure

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.text: We may periodically update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through service notifications. The last update date is indicated at the beginning of the document.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or data processing, contact us:

introduction.title: General Provisions
introduction.text: Gridix company strives to ensure high quality service and customer satisfaction. This Refund Policy describes the conditions under which you can request a refund for paid funds for using the FloorPlan Wizard service.
introduction.importantText: Please carefully read the refund conditions before subscribing.

guarantee.title: Money Back Guarantee (14 days)
guarantee.text: We offer a 14-day money back guarantee for new subscriptions:
guarantee.item1: Refund available within 14 calendar days from the first payment
guarantee.item2: Applies only to the first subscription payment (does not apply to renewals)
guarantee.item4: No explanation of refund reasons required
guarantee.item5: After refund, access to paid features will be terminated
guarantee.noteText: To process a refund within 14 days, contact us at inbox@gridix.live

eligible.title: ✓ Refund is available in the following cases:
eligible.item1: First subscription within 14 days of payment
eligible.item2: Technical problems that make the service unusable
eligible.item3: Mismatch with stated functionality with documentary evidence
eligible.item4: Double charge due to technical reasons
eligible.item5: Subscription cancellation initiated by the company

notEligible.title: ✗ Refund is NOT provided in the following cases:
notEligible.item1: More than 14 days have passed since the first payment
notEligible.item4: Account blocking for violation of usage rules
notEligible.item5: Partial use of paid period (except 14-day guarantee)
notEligible.item6: Change of user decision without objective reasons (after 14 days)

process.title: Refund Process
process.text: To process a refund, follow these steps:

step1.title: Submit Request
step1.text: Write to inbox@gridix.live with subject "Refund Request"

step2.title: Provide Information
step2.text: Provide account email, payment date and refund reason (optional)

step3.title: Get Confirmation
step3.text: We will review your request within 2-3 business days

step4.title: Receive Refund
step4.text: Upon approval, refund will be processed within 5-10 business days to original payment method

timeline.title: Refund Timeline

processing.title: Processing Time:
processing.item2: Approval/rejection: within 1 business day after review

timeline.noteText: Actual receipt time may depend on your bank or payment system.

partialRefunds.title: Partial Refunds
partialRefunds.text: In some cases, a partial refund may be provided:
partialRefunds.item1: Significant technical problems affecting part of the subscription period
partialRefunds.calculation: Partial refund amount is calculated proportionally to unused subscription period or degree of service unavailability.

cancellation.title: Subscription Cancellation Without Refund
cancellation.text: You can cancel automatic subscription renewal at any time:
cancellation.item1: Access to service is retained until the end of paid period
cancellation.item3: No refund for remaining period (except cases described above)
cancellation.item4: You can resume subscription at any time
cancellation.howToText: Go to "Subscription" section in your account and click "Cancel Subscription"

technical.title: Technical Problems:
technical.text: If you encounter technical problems preventing service use, please contact our support first. We will try to resolve the issue before considering a refund.

forceMajeure.title: Force Majeure:
forceMajeure.text: In case of force majeure circumstances making service provision impossible, we may offer proportional refund or subscription extension.

functionality.title: Functionality Changes:
functionality.text: If significant functionality changes do not meet your expectations, we will consider refund on individual basis.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.text: If you disagree with the decision on your refund request:
disputes.item1: You can request reconsideration with additional evidence
disputes.item2: We strive to find fair solution for both parties
disputes.item3: If necessary, matter can be escalated to management
disputes.item4: As last resort, disputes are resolved according to applicable law

changes.title: Changes to Refund Policy
changes.text1: Gridix company reserves the right to change the terms of this Refund Policy. Changes take effect upon publication on the website.
changes.text2: Significant changes worsening conditions for users do not apply to existing subscriptions until renewal.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.responseTimeText: We strive to respond to all refund requests within 2-3 business days.

general.title: General Provisions
general.text1: This User Agreement (hereinafter - "Agreement") governs the relationship between Gridix company (hereinafter - "Company", "we") and users of the FloorPlan Wizard service (hereinafter - "Service", "Platform").
general.text2: By using our Service, you agree to the terms of this Agreement. If you do not agree with any terms, please do not use the Service.
general.importantText: Please read all terms carefully before starting to use the Service.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.text: FloorPlan Wizard is a cloud platform for creating interactive real estate plans, providing the following features:

registration.title: Registration:
registration.item1: An account is required to use the Service
registration.item2: You must provide accurate and current information
registration.item3: You are responsible for the confidentiality of your password
registration.item4: One person may have only one account

requirements.title: User Requirements:
requirements.item1: Age 18 or older, or parental/guardian consent
requirements.item2: Legal capacity to enter into contracts

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.text: By using the Service, you agree to:
userObligations.item1: Use the Service only for lawful purposes
userObligations.item2: Not violate the rights of third parties
userObligations.item4: Not attempt unauthorized access to the system
userObligations.item5: Not use the Service for spam or fraud
userObligations.item7: Not resell access to the Service without permission

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.item1: Using the Service for illegal activities
prohibitedUses.item4: Attempts to hack or bypass security systems
prohibitedUses.item7: Collection of personal data of other users
prohibitedUses.item8: Use of automated tools without permission

companyRights.title: Company Rights:
companyRights.text: All rights to the Service, including software, design, trademarks and content, belong to the Company.

userRights.title: User Rights:
userRights.item1: You retain rights to content you upload
userRights.item2: You grant the Company a license to use content for Service operation
userRights.item3: You warrant that you have rights to uploaded materials

pricing.title: Pricing and Payment:
pricing.item1: Service is provided on a subscription basis
pricing.item2: Prices are listed on the official website and may change
pricing.item3: Payment is made in advance for the selected period

refunds.title: Refunds:
refunds.item1: Refund available within 14 days of payment
refunds.item2: In case of significant violations by the Company
refunds.item3: Unused portion of subscription is not refunded upon early termination

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability:
limitation.item1: Service is provided "as is" without any warranties
limitation.item2: Company is not liable for indirect damages
limitation.item3: Maximum liability is limited to amount paid for the Service
limitation.item4: Company does not guarantee uninterrupted Service operation

userLiability.title: User Liability:
userLiability.item3: For damages caused by violation of the Agreement

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.text: Personal data processing is governed by our

byUser.title: Termination by User:
byUser.item1: At any time by deleting the account
byUser.item2: Data may be deleted within 30 days
byUser.item3: Unused portion of subscription is not refunded

changes.title: Changes to Agreement
changes.text: The Company reserves the right to change the terms of this Agreement. We will notify users of significant changes at least 30 days in advance:
changes.continuation: Continued use of the Service after changes take effect means your acceptance of the new terms.

law.title: Applicable Law:
law.text: This Agreement is governed by the laws of Georgia.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution:
disputes.item1: Priority is given to pre-trial settlement
disputes.item2: Disputes are resolved by courts of Georgia

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.text: For all questions related to this Agreement, contact us:
contact.responseTimeText: We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours on business days.
